scripts.dev:local: concurrently "cd gateway && npm run dev" "cd auth-service && npm run dev" "cd user-service && npm run dev"
scripts.init:prisma: npm run generate:prisma && npm run migrate:prisma && npm run seed:prisma
scripts.generate:prisma: cd user-service && npx prisma generate && cd ../auth-service && npx prisma generate
scripts.migrate:prisma: cd user-service && npx prisma migrate dev --name init && cd ../auth-service && npx prisma migrate dev --name init
scripts.seed:prisma: cd user-service && npx prisma db seed && cd ../auth-service && npx prisma db seed
